Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class that manages the player of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(Socket client, MatchManager matchManager)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      client - Socket to copy
      matchManager - matchManager

    • Player

      public Player​(String name, Match match, int order, String dashboard, Marketplace marketplace, DevelopmentGrid developmentGrid, boolean isSinglePlayer, LeadersList leadersList) throws Exception
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      name - of the player
      match - where the player wants to join
      order - of the player
      dashboard - of the player
      marketplace - of the match
      developmentGrid - of the match
      isSinglePlayer - boolean to establish if it is a single player match or not
      leadersList - list of leaders to choose
      Throws:
      Exception - checked exception

  • Method Details

    • getSelectedItemsInPreMatch

      public int getSelectedItemsInPreMatch()
      Gets the number of selected items in the pre match session by the player (first player has to select 0 items to take, second and third player have to select one item and the fourth player has to select 2 items)
      Returns:
      number of the items

    • addSelectedItemsInPreMatch

      public void addSelectedItemsInPreMatch()
      Adds the selected items to the counter

    • getSelectedLeadersInPreMatch

      public int getSelectedLeadersInPreMatch()
      Gets the number of selected leader cards in the pre match session by the player (every player has to select two leaders to take)
      Returns:
      index of the cards

    • addSelectedLeaderInPreMatch

      public void addSelectedLeaderInPreMatch()
      Adds the selected leaders to the counter

    • getOrder

      public int getOrder()
      Gets the order of the player
      Returns:
      the order of the player

    • listenRoutine

      private void listenRoutine()
      Routine performed by the socket to listen. It is performed at max once every 5 seconds

    • heartbeat

      private void heartbeat()
      Send an heartbeat to the player once every 8 seconds to tell him everything is ok
